testcase.name: Be able to add, update, fetch and delete a student
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Be able to add, update, fetch and delete a student Given request is made to add student endpoint ... passed in 0.521s Then verify that the request is successfully made with a status code of 200 ... passed in 0.000s And request is made to the update student endpoint to update student record ... passed in 0.041s Then verify that the request is successfully made with a status code of 200 ... passed in 0.000s And verify that the id key is returned in the response body ... passed in 0.001s And verify that the firstName key is returned in the response body ... passed in 0.000s And verify that the lastName key is returned in the response body ... passed in 0.000s And verify that the studentClass key is returned in the response body ... passed in 0.000s And verify that the nationality key is returned in the response body ... passed in 0.000s And verify that the nationality of the student is Canada ... passed in 0.000s Then request is made to the fetch students endpoint ... passed in 0.042s Then verify that the request is successfully made with a status code of 200 ... passed in 0.000s Then request is made to the fetch students endpoint by id ... passed in 0.049s And verify that the request is successfully made with a status code of 200 ... passed in 0.000s Then request is made to the fetch students endpoint by class ... passed in 0.026s And verify that the request is successfully made with a status code of 200 ... passed in 0.000s Then request is made to the fetch students endpoint by id and class ... passed in 0.021s And verify that the request is successfully made with a status code of 200 ... passed in 0.000s Then request is made to the delete student endpoint ... passed in 0.123s And verify that the request is successfully made with a status code of 200 ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
